question: Which is the first Indian airline to use robotic technology to disinfect aircraft interiors?
explanation:
The Air India Express has become the first airline in India to use robotic technology to clean and disinfect the interiors of aircrafts.
It used an ultraviolet Robotic device, fitted with UV disinfection lamping system to disinfect its Boeing 737-800 aircraft. This technology was launched in India in association with ground handling agency AISATS.
